languages.text: Правление Вистенцы Вьятт было долгим и кровавым. Князь удовольствий открыл ей секреты метаморфоз, и натура Януса была преображена. Во дворец Вистенцы шла бесконечная вереница серфов, чьи кровь, плоть и душа потребовались для экспериментов или увеселений на ее балах. С годами тело Вистенцы покрылось чешуей, стало гибким и длинным, и она более не покидала логово, наполненное образчиками восхитительного деградантного искусства и развращенной мудрости.

Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.
languages.original_text: Правление Вистенцы Вьятт было долгим и кровавым. Князь удовольствий открыл ей секреты метаморфоз, и натура Януса была преображена. Во дворец Вистенцы шла бесконечная вереница серфов, чьи кровь, плоть и душа потребовались для экспериментов или увеселений на ее балах. С годами тело Вистенцы покрылось чешуей, стало гибким и длинным, и она более не покидала логово, наполненное образчиками восхитительного деградантного искусства и развращенной мудрости.

traits.locale_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus' nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was going into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales and turned long and flexible. She no longer left her lair, filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

languages.text: 维丝坦萨·维亚特持续着漫长而血腥的统治。欢愉王子赐予了她擢升的秘密，而加努斯本性也渐渐改变。无数农奴被送进了维丝坦萨的宫殿之中，那些人的血肉与灵魂成为了养料，用来进行各种各样的实验或毫无节制的狂欢。随着岁月的流逝，维丝坦萨的身体渐渐变得越来越长，不断蜿蜒的身体上覆满了鳞片。她盘踞在她的巢穴之中，尽情享受美味的腐化与堕落的智慧。
languages.original_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

traits.locale_text: 维丝坦萨·维亚特持续着漫长而血腥的统治。欢愉王子赐予了她擢升的秘密，而加努斯本性也渐渐改变。无数农奴被送进了维丝坦萨的宫殿之中，那些人的血肉与灵魂成为了养料，用来进行各种各样的实验或毫无节制的狂欢。随着岁月的流逝，维丝坦萨的身体渐渐变得越来越长，不断蜿蜒的身体上覆满了鳞片。她盘踞在她的巢穴之中，尽情享受美味的腐化与堕落的智慧。

languages.text: ヴィステンツァ・ビャットの治世は永く血みどろのものであった。悦楽の貴公子が変身の秘密を彼女に授け、ヤヌスの自然はがらりと姿を変えた。奴隷の集団が彼女の宮殿に送り込まれ、彼らの血、肉、そして魂が実験や終わりのないお祭り騒ぎに費やされた。数年経つと、ヴィステンツァの身体は鱗に覆われ、長く曲がりくねったものになった。彼女は甘美な堕落と腐敗した知恵で溢れかえった隠れ家から出なくなった。
languages.original_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

languages.text: Le règne de Vistenza Vyatt fut aussi long que sanglant. Le prince du plaisir lui fit don des secrets de la métamorphose, ce qui lui permit de changer la nature de Janus. Un flot ininterrompu de serfs était envoyé à son palais, dont le sang, la chair et l'âme servaient à des expérimentations ou des réjouissances sans fin. Au fil des ans, le corps de Vistenza se couvrit d'écailles et devint long et sinueux. Elle cessa de quitter son antre, qui était empli de spécimens délicieusement avilis et à la sagesse corrompue.
languages.original_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

languages.text: El reinado de Vistenza Vyatt fue largo y sangriento. El Príncipe del Placer le había entregado los secretos de la metamorfosis, y, con ellos, la naturaleza de Janus se transformó. Se enviaba una hilera interminable de siervos al palacio para consumir su sangre, carne y alma en infinidad de experimentos o mero deleite. Con los años, el cuerpo de Vistenza se cubrió de escamas y su figura se volvió alargada y sinuosa. Ya nunca abandonaba su guarida, llena de especímenes de degradación deliciosa y sabiduría corrupta.
languages.original_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

Se enviaba una hilera interminable de siervos al palacio para consumir su sangre, carne y alma en infinidad de experimentos o mero deleite. Con los años, el cuerpo de Vistenza se cubrió de escamas y su figura se volvió alargada y sinuosa. Ya nunca abandonaba su guarida, llena de especímenes de degradación deliciosa y sabiduría corrupta.

languages.text: Die Herrschaft von Vistenza Vyatt war lang und blutig. Der Prinz des Vergnügens übergab ihr die Geheimnisse der Metamorphose, und Janus' Natur wurde verwandelt. Endlose Schlangen von Sklaven wurden in ihren Palast geschickt, ihr Blut, ihr Fleisch und ihre Seelen verbraucht bei Experimenten oder endlosen Gelagen. Mit den Jahren war Vistenzas Körper überall mit Schuppen bedeckt, und sie wurde lang und geschmeidig. Sie verließ ihren Bau nicht mehr, der angefüllt war mit delikat verrotteten Exemplaren und korrumpierter Weisheit.

languages.text: Vistenza Vyatt'ın hükümdarlığı, uzun ve kanlı oldu. Haz Prensi ona metamorfozun sırlarını bahşetti, Janus'un doğası dönüşüm geçirdi. Sarayına sonsuz sayıda köle gönderildi. Bunların kanları, etleri ve ruhları; deneylerde veyahut sonu gelmeyen eğlencelerde tüketildi. Vistenza'nın bedeni, yıllar içinde pullarla kaplandı, uzadı ve bükük bir şekil aldı. Bir daha da bozulmuş, leziz numunelerden ve yoz bilgilerden geçilmeyen konağından asla çıkmadı.
languages.original_text: Vistenza Vyatt's reign was long and bloody. The Prince of Pleasure bestowed the secrets of metamorphoses upon her, and Janus's nature was transformed. An endless string of serfs was sent into her palace, their blood, flesh, and souls consumed in experimentation or endless revelry. Over the years, Vistenza's body became covered in scales, becoming long and sinuous. She no longer left her lair, which was filled with specimens of delicious degradation and corrupted wisdom.

traits.locale_text: Vistenza Vyatt'ın hükümdarlığı uzun ve kanlı oldu. Zevk Prensi ona metamorfozun sırlarını bahşetti ve Janus'un doğası dönüşüm geçirdi. Sarayına sonsuz sayıda köle gönderildi ve kanları, etleri ve ruhları, deneylerde veyahut da sonu gelmeyen eğlencelerde tüketildi. Vistenza'nın bedeni yıllar içinde pullarla kaplandı, uzadı ve bükümlü bir şekle büründü. Bir daha da bozulmuş, leziz numunelerle ve yozlaşmış bilgilerle dolu konağını asla terk etmedi.
